entry.source: 〉 You hear a voice coming from the other{F801}side of the wall...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 You hear a voice coming from the other{F801}side of the wall...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Voice\0Oh, I see. You're one of us. Looks{F801}like the Hunters have become the{F801}hunted.{F801}{F802}Welcome to the man-eating city of{F801}Ikebukuro.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Voice\0Oh, I see. You're one of us. Looks{F801}like the Hunters have become the{F801}hunted.{F801}{F802}Welcome to the man-eating city of{F801}Ikebukuro.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Voice\0There's no way anyone can take on{F801}Xi Wangmu... We've both come to the{F801}end of the line as Hunters...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Voice\0There's no way anyone can take on{F801}Xi Wangmu... We've both come to the{F801}end of the line as Hunters...{F801}
